service.name: CCR Obfuscation Service from Obfuscators, Inc
service.visible: A new button appears next to this CCR with the label 'anonymizer'
service.comment: There are no prerequisites for this module
service.explanation: Your CCR is anonymized so that you can talk safely with an untrusted service or party
service.technical: The Obfuscator Service is called with the 'Current CCR', using CXP
